fields.name: CampaignNameHeader3
fields.fieldText: {!CampaignName}

fields.name: SplashEventIdUniqueWarning
fields.fieldText: Splash Event Id Issue

fields.name: SplashIdNotUniqueMessage
fields.fieldText:
The Splash Event Id you entered is not unique. There is already a Splash Event Id that matches the one you entered in Salesforce. Only unique Ids are excepted into Salesforce to create an accurate sync of campaign members from Splash.


Please check your Splash Event Id and re-enter it.

fields.name: Campaign_Title
fields.fieldText: Campaign Title

validationRule.errorMessage: The campaign title must be no more than 50 characters. Please reduce the title text.

fields.name: CampaignTitleNote
fields.fieldText: Enter the name of your event only. For example: 'Best Practices for Designing in Retool'. The title length should not exceed 50 characters.

fields.name: Campaign_Start_Date
fields.fieldText: Campaign Start Date

fields.name: Campaign_End_Date
fields.fieldText: Campaign End Date

fields.name: CampaignStartDateNote
fields.fieldText: The Start Date is automatically populated with today's date. Remember to change the Start Date to the date your event starts or took place.

fields.name: CampaignEndDateNote
fields.fieldText: Providing a campaign End Date ensures accurate reporting.

fields.name: Channel
fields.fieldText: Channel

fields.name: CampaignChannelNote
fields.fieldText: What Channel best describes the campaign? For example, 'Webinar', 'Tradeshow', 'Hackathon', etc.

fields.name: Will_you_be_importing_leads_or_contacts_for_this_campaign
fields.fieldText: Will you be importing leads or contacts for this campaign?

fields.name: NoCampaignMembersNote
fields.fieldText:
﻿﻿If this campaign will not be used to add campaign members, select 'No'.

If this campaign will be linked to a Splash Event, then select 'Yes'. Splash Events sync with Salesforce to add campaign members.

fields.name: Campaign_Cost
fields.fieldText: Campaign Cost

fields.name: CostOnlyNote
fields.fieldText: ﻿Enter the cost of the campaign. If there is no cost associated with the campaign enter '0'. You can adjust the value later if it changes.

fields.name: CampaignOwnerNote
fields.fieldText: If the campaign owner is not you, click the 'X' to the right of the Campaign Owner field. Type the name of the person who should own the campaign and select the person's name.

fields.name: CampaignNameHeader1
fields.fieldText: {!CampaignName}

fields.name: SDRFollowUpNote
fields.fieldText: If SDRs will be required to follow-up on the MQL Campaign Members, select 'Yes'.

fields.name: Will_SDRs_be_assigned_MQLs_from_this_campaign
fields.fieldText: Will SDRs be assigned MQLs from this campaign?

fields.name: SplashNote
fields.fieldText: Splash Events require a Splash Event Id. Adding the Splash Event Id links the event to Salesforce and syncs campaign members. To create a Splash Event, use this How To Guide.

fields.name: Is_this_campaign_related_to_a_Splash_Event
fields.fieldText: Is this campaign related to a Splash Event?

fields.name: SplashEventIdNote
fields.fieldText: If this event is related to a Splash Event, a Splash Event Id is required. The Id must be unique to accurately sync campaign members from Splash.

fields.name: Splash_Event_Id
fields.fieldText: Splash Event Id

validationRule.errorMessage: Splash Events Ids are made up of numbers only and must contain 9 digits. Please check your Splash Event Id and re-enter it.

fields.name: CampaignNameHeader2
fields.fieldText: {!CampaignName}

fields.name: AdditionalDetailsNote
fields.fieldText: The information you provide below contains useful details for reporting.

fields.name: Funnel_Stage
fields.fieldText: Funnel Stage

fields.name: Target_Segment
fields.fieldText: Target Segment

fields.name: Vendor
fields.fieldText: Vendor

fields.name: Region
fields.fieldText: Region

fields.name: Target_Audience
fields.fieldText: Target Audience

fields.name: Initative
fields.fieldText: Initative
